short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension for a to-do list that syncs across Chromes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest open-source chrome to-do list that is saved across all instances of Google Chrome. 

Source code available at:

https://github.com/joechee/lithium
